data.title: San Antonio Spurs Roster
data.meta_description: San Antonio Spurs scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Tim Duncan was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 1997 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Tim Duncan signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 23, 1997. Tim Duncan re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 1, 2000. Tim Duncan re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 16, 2003.

Manu Ginobili was selected as the #28 pick in the Second Round of the 1999 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Manu Ginobili signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 18, 2002. Manu Ginobili re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 14, 2004.

Tony Parker was selected as the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2001 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Tony Parker signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on September 21, 2001. Tony Parker signed a multi-year extension with the San Antonio Spurs on November 1, 2004.

Beno Udrih was selected as the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2004 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Beno Udrih signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 14, 2004.

Brent Barry signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 15, 2004.

Bruce Bowen signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 29, 2001. Bruce Bowen re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 22, 2002. Bruce Bowen re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 14, 2004.

Michael Finley signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on September 1, 2005.

Robert Horry signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 24, 2003. Robert Horry re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 3, 2004. Robert Horry re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 2, 2005.

Sean Marks signed a contract with the San Antonio Spurs on November 17, 2003. Sean Marks re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 30, 2004. Sean Marks re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on September 2, 2005.

Rasho Nesterovic signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 16, 2003.

Fabricio Oberto signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 2, 2005.

Melvin Sanders signed a contract with the San Antonio Spurs on January 22, 2006. Melvin Sanders re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on March 16, 2006. Melvin Sanders re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on March 26, 2006.

Nick Van Exel signed a contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 29, 2005.
